page.title: 12Entertainment for Adults
page.content: Unlike the cities,in the Carnoustie area there are not many places where people can pass their spare time. There are no night-clubs,no cinemas, no theatre, no ice-rink,no rollerama, no swimming. There are many golf clubs in Carnoustie and besides golf meetings there are often social events organized for members and their guests.The{Carnoustie Golf Club}holds about 14 dances each year and around 100 people attend each one.Each evening members can use the bars within the club.There are two _ one for men only and one for men and women. The{"19th Hole"}is one of several Carnoustie pubs.About 120 people come in every day.The most popular drink there is lager.Sometimes on special nights the pub has little parties.
